Text.val: 28.04.2014 JH SCR18862 Step 3; Added calculation of fixed amount
04.05.2011 JH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
17.02.2011 SH SCR16234 Used client langauge for MlsTrans()
14.02.2011 SH SCR16155 Changed GB417 input parameters
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
-- If PO.CPCO_ID = 0 go to step 9 to update ICPH_CHEQUECOSTSCHARGED
-- Step 2 - Calculate costs for total amount
-- Step 3 - Calculate costs for individual cheques
... switch back to previous system langage

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,20})&' and ICPH_BANK_ADMNO = '&Trim (Str ({0,4},'4'))&' and ICPH_BANK_LEDG_NO = '&Trim (Str ({0,5},'9'))&' and ICPH_BANK_CURRENCY = '&ASCIIChr (39)&Trim ({0,6})&ASCIIChr (39)&')'
'CHQE_CHQU_ID in (select ICPH_CHQU_ID from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/ICPH where ICPH_ROWTYPE in (3,4) and ICPH_CHQU_ID > 0 and ICPH_CHEQUECOSTSCHARGED = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'N'&ASCIIChr (39)

Text.val: -- Step 2 - Calculate costs for total amount
-- If CPCO_BOOK_INDIVIDUAL = false then call GB416
-- V.NUMBEROFCHEQUES = total number of CHQE rows
-- Step 3 - Calculate costs for individual cheques
-- If CPCO_BOOK_INDIVIDUAL = true then call GB416

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CHQE where :2 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Step 3 - Calculate costs for individual cheques
